org.gbif.occurrencestore.search

Class OccurrenceSearchRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.search.OccurrenceSearchRequestBuilder

  • public class OccurrenceSearchRequestBuilder
extends Object
    Utility class for building Solr queries from supported parameters for occurrences search.

    • Method Detail

      • parseGeometryParam

        protected static String parseGeometryParam(String wkt)
        Parses a geometry parameter in WKT format. If the parsed geometry is a polygon the produced query will be in INTERSECTS(wkt parameter) format. If the parsed geometry is a rectangle, the query is transformed into a range query using the southmost and northmost points.

      • build

        public org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrQuery build(@Nullable
                                           org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchRequest request)
